talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Elf Elder$
{user_nick}, you're back!

$Elf Elder$
I heard that you went to the Praying Heart.
Is there something wrong?

${user_nick}$
I… I should go to the Wailing Wall first.
(I'm not ready to break the news about Argenta's death...)

$Elf Elder$
I see. Please be careful.
You can go to the Wailing Wall from the Lava River Entrance.
(Go to the Wailing Wall)

*You cannot proceed in a party.

${user_nick}$
I can go to the Wailing Wall from the Lava River Entrance....
(Go to the Wailing Wall)

*You cannot proceed in a party.

$Feder$
Is it you…?

${user_nick}$
Feder? Why are you here…!

$Feder$
I sensed a dreg of Ancient Dragon so came here to take a look. Looks like he isn't here yet.
His sword is drained of any power too.

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9457_qu_01.ogg}
How pathetic the Ancient Dragon struggles to carry on its existence.

${user_nick}$
How can you say that?
It's you who made this world like this!!
Now that you've lost one of your jewels, it's time you stopped!

$Feder$
Haha! Stop? Do you think losing a jewel would matter to me?
How foolish of you to think that the jewel is the root of my power!

${user_nick}$
I know you're nothing but an ordinary human without the jewel!
I know that you can't use the Red Dragon's jewel! That's why you experimented on Velskud!

$Feder$
(He sneers at you)
That was such a long time ago.
I admit that Silver Dragon was strong. She managed to hurt me.
But as soon as I recoer, I will open the door and challenge the Gods.

${user_nick}$
But you lost half of your strength!
Yet you still don't give up?!

$Feder$
Why would I? The Monolith has opened like what I have planned.
Everything is going the way I planned. Why should I give up?
Losing a few of my followers is nothing.

$Feder$
Come to think of it, you always fled like a coward at every critical moment.
How did someone with such a faint heart enter the Monolith?

${user_nick}$
I didn't run away! The Monolith kept jumping me through time!

$Feder$
Swept by the Monolith? That's even more pathetic! Instead of being a slave to your fear, you are a slave to forces beyond your control!

${user_nick}$
I came to the Monolith of my own free will, and I'm not weak. I'm going to stop you, no matter what it takes!

$Feder$
Recognize how weak you are!
You don't even know what you're talking about! What did Meriendel see in a weakling like you? A good heart means nothing. It takes strength to change the world.

$Feder$
It is power that canges the world, and it is determination that makes you gain power!
Those who don't even realize this will be devoured by their own power when they finally attain it.
I'm talking about your future, you fool. Idiots who don't even realize who they are when they become blinded by a strength too powerful!

$Feder$
The moment you acknowledged you were swept by the Monolith, you've acknowledged your weakness. Are you going to give that excuse to everyone you meet?
Your attitude sickens me.

${user_nick}$
What?!

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9457_qu_02.ogg}
I'm keeping you alive so that you will realize how foolish you were one day.
It's better to die knowing that you're a fool.

${user_nick}$
Shut your mouth!!! What did I do wrong?? You're the one who doesn't know the mistakes you've made!!!

$Feder$
I don't even see the need to answer you.
I'm glad I didn't take you in as my follower.(Feder turns and leaves without another word.)

$Geraint$
You've come a long way.

${user_nick}$
Geraint...?! How did you...???
Did I jump across time again..??

$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_01.ogg}
Time does not matter. This is the last remnant of my power within the sword. And this will be the last time I can manifest myself like this...

${user_nick}$
Why... why are you wasting it on appearing before me? You should've manifested in front of a crowd instead of me!

$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_02.ogg}
It looks like a lot has happened since we last parted.
I only have memories of the time we've spent together. Fill me in on what happened after that.

${user_nick}$
Yes. A lot has happened. But now I feel as if I've worked for nothing...

${user_nick}$
I'm sorry Geraint...

$Geraint$
I don't understand why you're apologizing.
Though I don't know what happened, you seem like you've gone through hard times. You don't have to be sorry about anything.

${user_nick}$
(Explain to him everything that has happened)

$Geraint$
I see. Argenta...

${user_nick}$
I'm sorry... I'm really sorry...

$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_03.ogg}
You don't have to apologize. She has made a choice to protect this world. Dragons exist only to complete their mission. Any one of us would gladly throw our lives aside to do so. We're different from humans...

$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_04.ogg}
If we have made you tied down with memories of the past like the Six Heroes...
I apologize on behalf of Argenta.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Yes, this is what Geraint was like...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_05.ogg}
You're raising your voice. Are you angry? I may not understand humans well, but I hope you are not disheartened about this.

$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_06.ogg}
I'm happy that you seem less distressed now. This is the last time you'll see me so I'll tell you everything I can.

$Geraint$
First, don't be tied down by the past. If you become weak, Argenta would be angry.
And I want to thank you.

${user_nick}$
Thank me? Why...?

$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_07.ogg}
I don't know how to describe in words, but I thank you deeply.
You have made the humans and elves join forces to fight against the evil.
I tried so hard for this 50 years ago, but failed due to my ignorance.

$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_08.ogg}
You've made my dream a reality.
You're my hero...
Thank you.

$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_09.ogg}
People call me a hero, but I'm just a dragon who fulfilled its duties.
I learnt that the term "hero" refers to a person who never gives up even in despair, and goes forward to save all lives.
That is you.

$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_10.ogg}
Don't underestimate yourself. You are a brave and strong hero.

$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_11.ogg}
Iona must have gave you his powers because he believed in you. I can see that you're being protected by his power.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What do you mean you don't have much time?</html>
<html>No, don't talk like this is the last time I'll see you!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_12.ogg}
I don't have much time left, but I'm glad could see you again, at least like this.

$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_13.ogg}
(Geraint smiles.)
I have one last request. I must be resurrected by now, but I must be young and weak. Unlike me who was born with power from the start, he would have a lot of things to learn.

$Geraint${sound:npc_Geraint_9457_qu_14.ogg}
Please look after the young Geraint...

$Geraint$
Hey! Why are you zoning out?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's a shame you don't have his memories.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9457_qu_01.ogg}
Hey I'm not little! Why are you staring at my sword like that?
Is it because of the old me? Whatever I do, you'll just compare me with the old one.

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9457_qu_02.ogg}
Well I'm the only Geraint now! Hmph, anyway, you're coming with me to take revenge on the Black Knight, right?

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9457_qu_03.ogg}
Are you stupid? You were Argenta's friend, and the Black Knight killed her! Friends are there for taking revenge!

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9457_qu_04.ogg}
Whatever, he's my enemy now and enemies are to be eliminated!
He even took Argenta's jewel! He left my sword behind though...

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9457_qu_05.ogg}
What did he do to my sword? The energy is almost empty! And it's a little big...
(Geraint staggers as he tries to swing the sword)

${user_nick}$
(Can he really fulfill his mission like a dragon?)

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9457_qu_06.ogg}
Let's go! I'm sure he didn't go too far. I should have remembered his smell.

${user_nick}$
Wait, I need to report to Elf Elder too.

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9457_qu_07.ogg}
What for?

${user_nick}$
…well, it's what I have to do…
(Your head is aching as you think about how to explain it to him)
Anyway, be a good boy and just wait for me here, will you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Is that why he didn't talk to me much?)</html>
<html>(Does that mean he didn't really hate me or something... right?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9457_qu_08.ogg}
I've always been a good boy! Argenta said this is a holy land of the elves so I would get chased out if I talked too much. I don't intend on wasting my breath either.

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9457_qu_09.ogg}
Be quick, you stupid {user_nick}.
Or I'll come with you to Anu Arendel.

${user_nick}$
(You resist the urge to smack his head)
(He's just a young boy... so I should control myself... Old Geraint also wanted me to take care of him... I should just report to Elf Elder first)

${user_nick}$
(I hope Elf Elder is doing well)

$Elf Elder$
{user_nick}! You're alive! I was so worried when the king told me that the Monolith had opened.

${user_nick}$
Oh... so you've heard?

$Elf Elder$
I just heard. You don't have to worry about me and Yuvenc... I mean King Federeth now.
(Elf Elder looks sorry to have made you worried)

${user_nick}$
That's good news. I came to report to you on the details about the battle.

$Elf Elder$
Great.
I will hear this with the king. Let's go.

$Elf Elder$
...(He is looking at Federeth with disapproval. Talk to Elf King Federeth.)

$Elf King Federeth$
Good to see you! I was worried that the painful screams were still heard from the Monolith when most of the Dragon Followers outside had been killed.

$Elf King Federeth${sound:npc_ElfKing_9457_qu_01.ogg}
But it strange that the Goddess's nightmares didn't pour in from the door when it was opened. Please tell us in detail what happened.

${user_nick}$
(Tell them everything that happened)

$Elf King Federeth$
The Silver Dragon is... dead?! With Goddess's nightmares and Black Dragon's jewel...?
And the Black Dragon is tracking Feder down... That's so likely of him.

$Elf King Federeth$
The Silver Dragon has sacrificed her life to save us. We would have been helpless if we were attacked by the poison and nightmares once again.

$Elf King Federeth${sound:npc_ElfKing_9457_qu_02.ogg}
But like what Velskud said, the fact that the Monolith opened signals our defeat.
Though an instant doom was prevented, this world will slowly fall.

$Elf King Federeth${sound:npc_ElfKing_9457_qu_03.ogg}
And it's so likely of him to advise you to run away. Hahahaha.
People say humans change easily, but some things don't seem to change. Huhuhu.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9457_qu_01.ogg}
(The Elf Elder clears his throat loudly)
Your Highness, please cut the small talk. This is a time of emergency.

$Elf King Federeth${sound:npc_ElfKing_9457_qu_04.ogg}
Oh I'm sorry. I got a little too excited talking about a few friends of mine.
But Don't you agree that he gave some useful advice?

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9457_qu_02.ogg}
What? He asked a brave hero who has persuaded everyone to stand against the evil to run away!

$Elf King Federeth${sound:npc_ElfKing_9457_qu_05.ogg}
Not everyone thinks like you, Elder.
Don't talk like you've never seen the evil before.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9457_qu_03.ogg}
...!!!

$Elf King Federeth${sound:npc_ElfKing_9457_qu_06.ogg}
Perhaps the humans who always care about useless things regard this seriously.
Of course, I may be wrong but we need to see this from many perspectives.

$Elf King Federeth${sound:npc_ElfKing_9457_qu_07.ogg}
Fleeing would give you freedom. So it may not be a bad choice.
I don't know how long that freedom would last, but you can escape the possibility of going to jail.

$Elf King Federeth$
Your freedom may last forever, or end in an instant and lead you to destruction.
There are too many possibilities, and it's impossible for us to tell you which way to choose.

$Elf King Federeth${sound:npc_ElfKing_9457_qu_08.ogg}
All we can do is to support any decision you make.

${user_nick}$
Any decision...?

$Elf King Federeth${sound:npc_ElfKing_9457_qu_09.ogg}
Yes. I'm sure you're not going to aim for destroying this world or becoming the next God. What is your biggest goal? If you focus on that, you will see the path you have to take.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9457_qu_04.ogg}
But you must not choose just any path. You should think of the consequences too.
Choose a path that will not make you regret.

$Elf King Federeth${sound:npc_ElfKing_9457_qu_11.ogg}
Having to think of too many things may hinder our friend from making a decision.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9457_qu_05.ogg}
Well that's much better than doing some wrong things and regretting in the future, like what you did.

${user_nick}$
(They're quarrelling again...)
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Elf King Federeth${sound:npc_ElfKing_9457_qu_12.ogg}
Hmm… well this isn't something we can have a say in. Let's wait for the decision.
Please show our friend the way out. I'll think about this.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9457_qu_06.ogg}
Of course. Don't worry about it. I'll talk to you again outside, {user_nick}.

(Talk to Elf Elder outside the Tree of Life)

qstep_change.comment: 내가 그렇게나 잘못한거야? 내가 뭐를? 아르젠타를 도와서 세계를 지키려고 한 행동의 어디가 잘못되었단 말이지? 나는...

journal.title: Farewell 1
journal.contents:
Find Geraint's sword at the Wailing Wall.

Anu Arendel (Lava River) → Wailing Wall (Geraint's Sword)

journal.title: Farewell 2
journal.contents:
You encountered Feder at the Wailing Wall. Talk to him.

Anu Arendel (Lava River) → Wailing Wall (Feder)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Feder at the Wailing Wall
journal.todo_msg: Feder showed up. Talk to him.

journal.title: Farewell 3
journal.contents:
Geraint appeared! The old Geraint! Talk to him.

Anu Arendel (Lava River) → Wailing Wall (Geraint)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Geraint at the Wailing Wall
journal.todo_msg: Geraint showed up. Talk to him.

journal.title: Farewell 4
journal.contents:
Young Geraint has appeared. Talk to him.

Anu Arendel (Lava River) → Wailing Wall (Geraint)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to young Geraint at the Wailing Wall

journal.title: Farewell 5
journal.contents:
Tell the Elf Elder about everything that happened.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) → Elf Elder
journal.destination: Talk to the Elf Elder in Anu Arendel
journal.todo_msg: Find the Elf Elder and talk to him.

journal.title: Farewell 6
journal.contents:
After hearing your report, the Elf Elder said you should report this matter to the Elf King. Meet Elf King Federeth in the Tree of Life.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) → Elf King Federeth
journal.destination: Talk to the Elf King in the Tree of Life
journal.todo_msg: Update the Elf King on the situation.
